name: Mayor Potato Demo
description:
Mayor Potato is a potato out to avenge his father Captain Potato from the notorious fruit group that has been seeking to destroy all vegetables. Mayor Potato wants to finish the war with the food groups and finally declare the vegetable group as the best food group of them all.  

Your mission is to use Mayor Potato to seek out the vegetable group and destroy Mr. Banana (boss) and avenge your father. 

Keyboard Controls  also show in Joystick icon (Soon to come controller)

Move: W, S, A, D

Shoot: Left Click

Jump: Space bar
